error.name_exists: This device name is already in use, please choose a different one.

user.description: Choose the gateway device name in Home Assistant.

options.description: Choose the gateway connection parameters and specify which PGNs to include or exclude. For best performance only use the PGNs that you wish to use. You can always update this later.
